summary: Dark red and black retexture of all dragon gear, i.e. both armor sets and all the dragonbone weapons.
descriptionHtml:
This is a dark red and black retexture of all the Dragon gear:

Dragon Plate Armor, Gauntlets, Shield, Boots, Helmet
Dragon Scale Armor, Gauntlets, Shield, Boots, Helmet
All the Dragonbone Weapons added by Dawnguard (Requires Dawnguard)

Please check the images for further description, and feel free to add your own images.

Installation:
Extract the files to your Skyrim directory.

Uninstallation:
Delete the following folders for the armors:
Data\\Textures\\armor\\dragonbone
Data\\Textures\\armor\\dragonscale
And for the weapons:
Data\\Textures\\dlc01\\weapons\\dragonbone

I may be able to do other colors, so ask about that in the comments.
author: Jay33721
